author: dlr
msg: Backported some of my clarifications from the jakarta-turbine-torque
module as to what this class actually does and how it works:
Table of "drivers" is actually a table of "adapters" keyed by JDBC
driver name.  Updated documentation, variable, and methods names

author: jmcnally
msg: removed use of Introspector due to bugs.  The code is actually cleaner without
it.  Also added Jon's patches to properly close streams.
